citations.narrative:
The licensee has an inventory, but the inventory doesn't show where the animals came from or the date they were
received. Lack of acquisition information doesn't allow for proper tracking by APHIS officials. All acquisition information
must be documented for all regulated animals. Correct by 7/20/25.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with the licensee.
End of report.
